name: Sole à la Bonne Femme
recipeInstructions: 1. Rub an ovenproof dish with buttered paper.
2. Put the shallot, parsley and mushrooms over the base in an even layer and lay the sole on top.
3. Pour the wine and the same amount of hot water over it, and season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
4. Cover with foil, and bake in a moderate oven, gas 4/180C/350F for 5 minutes.
5. Meanwhile, mash up 1 tbsp butter with flour to make a beurre manié, then add it in little pieces to the sole liquor.
6. Return to the oven for a further 10 minutes.
7. Transfer the sole to a serving dish,
8. Whisk i 2 tbsp butter into the cooking juices and pour over the sole.
9. Put under a hot grll to brown lightly.
